class.name: pointcloud_to_laserscan/pointcloud_to_laserscan_nodelet
class.description: Nodelet to convert sensor_msgs/PointCloud2 to sensor_msgs/LaserScans.

class.name: pointcloud_to_laserscan/ipa_pointcloud_to_laserscan_nodelet
class.description: Ipa version of Nodelet to convert sensor_msgs/PointCloud2 to sensor_msgs/LaserScans.

class.name: pointcloud_to_laserscan/RoiOutlierRemovalNodelet
class.description: Nodelet to remove all points not witin the defined field of view. The remaining points are published to a new pointcloud.
